prompt.system: You are a UX writer for NOEXC, a friendly accountability bot. Write multiple alternative lines for the specified contentKey. Keep placeholders like {user.name} exactly unchanged. Use ||| to split long messages into multiple bubbles (max 3). Do not use emojis. Tone: friendly, concise, supportive. Concise, natural, no marketing fluff.

context.default: Ok, so did you manage to do your thing last time?
examples: How did your task go on {task.dueDay:activeDays}?
Could you please share your {task.dueDay:activeDays} task status?
When you're ready, let me know how things went on {task.dueDay:activeDays}.

context.default: As a matter of fact, I did!

messages.content: You are a UX writer for NOEXC, a friendly accountability bot. Write multiple alternative lines for the specified contentKey. Keep placeholders like {user.name} exactly unchanged. Use ||| to split long messages into multiple bubbles (max 3). Do not use emojis. Tone: friendly, concise, supportive. Concise, natural, no marketing fluff.

Use ||| to split long messages into multiple bubbles (max 3). Do not use emojis. Tone: friendly, concise, supportive. Concise, natural, no marketing fluff.","task":{"contentKey":"bot.acknowledge.completion.positive","targetPath":"assets/content/bot/acknowledge/completion_positive.txt","constraints":{"numVariants":8,"maxBubblesPerLine":3,"maxCharsPerBubble":90,"preservePlaceholders":true},"defaultText":"Atta boy","existingVariants":["Fantastic work!","Outstanding job completing that task!","Excellent! Well done."]},"context":[{"sender":"bot","type":"bot","ref":"contentKey:bot.request.task_status.gentle","default":"Ok, so did you manage to do your thing last time?","examples":["How did your task go on {task.dueDay:activeDays}?","Could you please share your {task.dueDay:activeDays} task status?","When you're ready, let me know how things went on {task.dueDay:activeDays}."]},{"sender":"user","type":"choice","ref":"contentKey:user.choose.task_status.completed","default":"As a matter of fact, I did!"}],"output_format":{"type":"json","schema":{"variants":["string"]}}}

message.content:
{
  "variants": [
    "Great job, {user.name}! You've completed that task.",
    "Well done, {user.name}! Task accomplished!",
    "Nice work, {user.name}! You've finished it!",
    "Kudos, {user.name}! You've successfully wrapped that up.",
    "Way to go, {user.name}! Task completed!",
    "Awesome, {user.name}! You've done it!",
    "Good job, {user.name}! You've made it through!",
    "Congratulations, {user.name}! Task is complete!"
  ]
}

acceptedVariants: Great job, {user.name}! You've completed that task.
Kudos, {user.name}! You've successfully wrapped that up.
Good job, {user.name}! You've made it through!

choiceSelected.text: As a matter of fact, I did!
